response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its value to you stands at $800,000, and we aim to ensure this transaction meets both our financial goals and your expectations. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you the product at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between our valuation and yours, aiming for mutual benefit. Please let me know if you require any additional information or wish to discuss this further.", "product_price": 950000}
